Reviews.Title: “Definitely not 4 star or close to the centre of Rome!”
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: booked groupon premise 4 star hotel rome getting deal unfortunately near centre rome hotel struggling 2 star 4 20 minute metro ride 20 minute walk allies stray cats dog mess locals hotel outside looks awful actually ground floor isnt shocking pretty clean enjoy ourselves treated sleep pool outside covered winter leaves overall trip hotel definitely plus

Reviews.Title: “A very pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: Nelie
Reviews.Content: returned rome spent 3 nights hotel booked minutecom top secret hotels total cost £120 read reviews panicked worried found hotel pleasant yes little city shuttle bus fantastic 3 euros return departure return times varied throughout day night stay fine hotel staff friendly helpful cleaned day towels changed breakfast usual continental bread stale croissants cereal cheese ham yogurts juices fresh fruit travelled city public transport easy 211 bus nearest metro station cost 4 euros ticket covers day travel buses dont mind inconvenience staying bit city hotel

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff and Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gwyndaff1974
Reviews.Content: wife booked hotel anniversary via lastminutecom mystery hotel styed 3 nights total cost £120 wife bit read various reviews claiming bad hotel experience contrary beginning stay hotel hotel 1015minutes outside centre rome emailed directions replied quickly concise instructions trains busses followed letter directly door steep driveway anyway clean cleaned daily staff friendly courteous didnt eat hotel couldnt comment food bar little expensive hotel bar expected pay little odds ran shuttle service termini romes central busmetro station 3 euros return ran various times throughout day pickups drop offs corner hotel pizzeria lovely cheap 5 euros pizza nice complain hotel 3 nights sightsee rome feel welcome time
